content.question: The decade of the 1970s was marked by all of the following economic conditions in the United States EXCEPT

choices.label: rising oil prices for businesses and consumers
greater participation by women in the paid workforce
increased competition from Western Europe and Japan
simultaneous inflation and recession, known as stagflation
increased labor union membership among autoworkers

content.answer: increased labor union membership among autoworkers

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
